title: Nature's strangest creatures
creator_credit: Walt Disney Productions and Ben Sharpsteen
brief_description: Presents Australia’s unusual wildlife at close range. Shots of the giant bat, the lunged fish, the frilled neck lizard, echidna and Tasmanian devil compose the opening sequences; there are glimpses of the emu, the bushy-tailed possum and the koala; and a longer section of the platypus and the kangaroo.
